movie.title: Babar: The Movie
movie.writer: Jean de Brunhoff (characters), Laurent de Brunhoff (characters), Patrick Loubert (story), Peter Sauder (story), Michael Hirsh (story), Peter Sauder (screenplay), J.D. Smith (screenplay), John de Klein (screenplay), Raymond Jafelice (screenplay), Alan Bunce (screenplay)
movie.actors: Gordon Pinsent, Elizabeth Hanna, Lisa Jai, Marsha Moreau
movie.plot: In his spectacular film debut, young Babar, King of the Elephants, must save his homeland from certain destruction by Rataxes and his band of invading rhinos.
